import axios from'axios';var baseUrl='/api/notes';//langApp
var getWord=function getWord(word){var wo=word.slice(0,2);var request=axios.get("api/blogs/letters/".concat(wo,"/").concat(word));return request.then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(err){return console.log("Could not get the word in the given form",err);});};//old
var getAll=function getAll(){var request=axios.get(baseUrl);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var create=function create(newObject){var request=axios.post(baseUrl,newObject);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var update=function update(id,newObject){var request=axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),newObject);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var deleteById=function deleteById(id){var request=axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id));return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};// eslint-disable-next-line import/no-anonymous-default-export
export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,update:update,deleteById:deleteById,getWord:getWord};
